tables.name: app_project
tables.description: This table stores detailed information about various property projects.

columns.name: project_no
columns.description: Unique identifier for each project.

columns.name: year_built
columns.description: The year in which the property was built.

columns.name: property_size
columns.description: The size of the property.

columns.name: price
columns.description: The listed price of the property.

columns.name: lot_size
columns.description: The size of the property's lot.

columns.name: price_per_sqft
columns.description: The price of the property per square foot.

columns.name: property_type
columns.description: The type of property, such as Condo, House, Villa, or Duplex.

columns.name: family_type
columns.description: The family type suitable for the property, such as Single or Multi.

columns.name: bedroom
columns.description: The number of bedrooms in the property.

columns.name: bathroom_details
columns.description: Detailed information about the bathrooms in the property.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The physical address of the property.

columns.name: appliances
columns.description: Details about the appliances included with the property.

columns.name: community_and_neighborhood
columns.description: Information about the community and neighborhood around the property.

columns.name: construction_details
columns.description: Details about the construction of the property.

columns.name: cooling
columns.description: Information about the cooling systems in the property.

columns.name: flooring
columns.description: Details of the types of flooring used in the property.

columns.name: green_energy_details
columns.description: Information about any green energy features in the property.

columns.name: heating
columns.description: Details about the heating system in the property.

columns.name: hoa_and_financial_details
columns.description: Information about homeowners association fees and other financial details related to the property.

columns.name: nearby_schools
columns.description: Details about schools in the vicinity of the property.

columns.name: parking_details
columns.description: Information about parking facilities available with the property.

columns.name: property_details
columns.description: General details and other information about the property.

columns.name: utility_details
columns.description: Details about the utilities available in the property.

columns.name: whats_special
columns.description: Special features or attractions of the property.

columns.name: contact_details
columns.description: Contact information for further inquiries about the property.

columns.name: country
columns.description: The country in which the property is located.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state in which the property is located.

columns.name: city
columns.description: The city where the property is located.

columns.name: zipcode
columns.description: The postal code of the property's location.

columns.name: getting_around_details
columns.description: Information about transportation options and accessibility in the area.

columns.name: other_details
columns.description: Any additional details or notes about the property.

tables.name: app_projectdocument
tables.description: This table stores documents related to the property projects, such as images, contracts, and plans.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each document.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of document (e.g., image, PDF).

columns.name: path
columns.description: The storage path or URL of the document.

columns.name: project_id
columns.description: The identifier of the project to which the document is related.

columns.name: project_no
columns.description: The project number associated with the document.
